page.title: 19A Typical School Day
page.content: On a typical day at school we have three main lessons. The list of the week's work is on the notice board and we have three of the four areas of: Maths, Creative Writing, Project work, and Literacy Skills. We have playtime at 10:45 to 11:00 and lunch from 12:00 to 1:15. Home time is 15:30. We have 30 in our class but work in groups of 7or8 On Wed, we have Hymn Practice at 9:00, then my group have Maths. We mostly do a Maths card and some work in"Fletcher" books. After play we have Creative Writing and might write a story or poem or letter. On Wed my group have Art and we might draw some berries that we got on the walk or paint or make something. At 14:00 we have football practice and then there is a short time left for a story to be read to us before hometime. This term's project has been all about Cogges etc. for the Domesday Survey.
